official_title: A bill to change the effective date for compensation for Members of Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to specify that pay adjustments for Members of Congress shall become effective at the beginning of the next Congress after the Congress during which such an adjustment is approved.

titles.title: A bill to change the effective date for compensation for Members of Congress.
